import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react'; class Register extends Component{ state = { username: "", matric: "", password: "", role: "", usernameError: "", matricError }; handleChange = event => { const isCheckbox = event.target.type === "checkbox"; this.setState({ [event.target.name] : isCheckbox ? event.target.checked : event.target.value }); }; handleSubmit = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault(); }; render(){ return( Nimelssa quiz - Registeration page

) } } export default Register;
